thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-DMG Entertainment And Media's Controlling Shareholder To Sell Shares In The Company To Anxin Trust

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DMG Entertainment And Media's Controlling Shareholder To Sell Shares In The Company To Anxin Trust

organizations.name: dmg entertainment and media co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - DMG Entertainment And Media Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER SIGNS AGREEMENT TO SELL 106.7 MILLION SHARES IN THE COMPANY, REPRESENTING 6.03 PERCENT OF TOTAL ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL, TO ANXIN TRUST Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DMkRjd Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
